articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Cuban State Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Cuban State Delegation
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, on Monday received the visiting state delegation of the Republic of Cuba headed by Miguel Diaz-Canel Bermudez, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, first vice-president of the Council of State and first vice-president of the Council of Ministers of Cuba.
					 He met with the members of the delegation and had a cordial talk with them.
					
					 He warmly welcomed the DPRK visit by the Cuban state delegation on the 55th anniversary of establishment of diplomatic relations between the two countries and asked the head of the delegation to convey his greetings to Comrade Fidel Castro Ruz and Comrade Raul Castro Ruz.
					
					 Comrade Fidel Castro Ruz and Comrade Raul Castro Ruz, close friends, comrades and comrades-in-arms of the Korean people, sent to the DPRK the state delegation of the Republic of Cuba one month before the 70th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea, a great encouragement to the service personnel and people of the DPRK who are working hard to build a thriving socialist country, he said.
					
					 The DPRK visit by the Cuban state delegation is of weighty significance in instilling the history and tradition of the friendship between the DPRK and Cuba into the rising generation and further developing the fraternal relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries, he said, expressing belief that the invincible vitality of DPRK-Cuba friendship would be more dynamically demonstrated in the future, too, thanks to the efforts of both sides.
					
					 Miguel Diaz-Canel Bermudez conveyed to Kim Jong Un a cordial greeting of Fidel Castro Ruz and Raul Castro Ruz.
					
					 He thanked Kim Jong Un for receiving the delegation though he is busy leading the drive for building a thriving nation.
					
					 He said that the friendly relations between the two countries provided by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il together with Comrade Fidel Castro Ruz and Comrade Raul Castro Ruz are developing under the special care of Marshal Kim Jong Un and Comrade Raul Castro Ruz.
					
					 The Cuban party and government are rejoiced over the great achievements the Korean people are making in the drive for building a thriving socialist nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, he noted.
					
					 Cuba and the DPRK are far away from each other geographically but they are firmly united with common ideology and friendship and the two peoples are comrades-in-arms standing together in the forefront for independence against imperialism, he said, adding it is the steadfast policy of the party and government of Cuba to steadily develop the Cuba-DPRK friendly and cooperative relations.
					
					 The conversation proceeded in a friendly and amicable atmosphere.
					
					 Miguel Diaz-Canel Bermudez presented a gift to Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Jong Un expressed thanks for this and had a photo session with the members of the Cuban state delegation.
					
					 Accompanying him was Kim Yang Gon, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Enjoys Art Performance Together with State Delegation of Cuba
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Enjoys Art Performance Together with State Delegation of Cuba
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, on Monday enjoyed an art performance given by the Moranbong Band and the State Merited Chorus in welcome of a state delegation of the Republic of Cuba visiting the DPRK on the occasion of the 55th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and Cuba.
					 Invited to enjoy the performance were Miguel Diaz-Canel Bermudez, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, first vice-president of the Council of State and first vice-president of the Council of Ministers of Cuba, and his wife, members of the Cuban state delegation, German Hermin Ferras Alvarez, Cuban ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 Among the audience were Hwang Pyong So, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Yang Gon, Ri Su Yong, Kim Kye Gwan, and other officials of the Central Committee of the WPK, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces and Foreign Ministry and artistes of the army and society including those of the Wangjaesan Art Troupe.
					
					 Kim Jong Un appeared at the auditorium together with Ri Sol Ju.
					
					 He warmly waved back to the enthusiastic cheers of the performers and audience.
					
					 Women artistes presented bequests to him and Miguel Diaz-Canel Bermudez.
					
					 The performance began with the playing of the national anthems of the Republic of Cuba and the DPRK.
					
					 Its repertoire included orchestral music "Pyongyang Is Best" and orchestral music and male chorus "Song of the Korean People's Army" and other numbers presented by the State Merited Chorus and light music "At One Go" by the Moranbong Band. 
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the undying exploits President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed by providing a great history and fine tradition of firm comradely obligation and friendship between the armies and peoples of the DPRK and Cuba and of the heroic spirit of Juche Korea which is working miracles and innovations in the drive for building a thriving nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The artistes of the Moranbong Band presented instrumental music and song "Guantanamera" and female chorus "Capri Island" reflecting the noble feelings of the Cuban people, delighting the audience.
					
					 When the historic scenes of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il meeting with Fidel Castro Ruz and Raul Castro Ruz appeared at the background, the theatre was wrapped with emotion.
					
					 The performance was acclaimed by the audience as it firmly convinced them that the long-standing friendship between the service personnel and peoples of the two countries would remain unchanged generation after generation in struggle for independence against imperialism and for socialism.
					
					 At the end of the performance stormy cheers of "hurrah!" resounded through the theatre.
					
					 Kim Jong Un warmly waved to the enthusiastic cheers of the performers and the audience.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Congratulates Syrian President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Congratulates Syrian President
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, Tuesday sent a message of greeting to Bashar Al-Assad, president of the Syrian Arab Republic, on his 50th birthday.
					 The message extended warm greetings to the Syrian president on his 50th birthday.
					
					 The government and people of Syria have overcome bravely all hardships and trials and made great progress in their struggle for safeguarding the safety of the country and its territorial integrity under the correct leadership of the president, it said.
					
					 It expressed belief that the people of Syria would surely win a final victory in the just struggle to defend the sovereignty of the country and dignity of the nation, standing up against the ceaseless invasion and terrorist acts of the hostile forces. It went on:
					
					 The government and people of the DPRK will always stand by the government and people of the Syrian Arab Republic in the joint struggle for independence against imperialism and extend invariable support and solidarity to your just struggle.
					
					 The message sincerely wished the president good health and bigger successes in his responsible work, expressing belief that the relations of the comradely friendship and militant solidarity between the two countries provided by the great preceding leaders would grow stronger by the joint efforts.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Reply Messages to Heads of State of Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Reply Messages to Heads of State of Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent messages to heads of state of different countries in reply to their messages of greeting on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 They included Syrian President Bashar Al-Assad, Pakistani President Mamnoon Hussain, Palestinian President Mahmoud Abbas, chairman of the Executive Committee of the Palestine Liberation Organization, Equatorial Guinean President Obiang Nguema Mbasogo and Angolan President Jose Eduardo Dos Santos.
					
					 He in the messages expressed deep thanks to them for sending sincere congratulations and salute on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and relevant countries would grow stronger, he wished them successes in their works.

articles.title: National Meeting Held to Mark DPRK's Birthday
articles.content:
National Meeting Held to Mark DPRK's Birthday
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place here Tuesday to mark the 67th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 President Kim Il Sung declared all over the world the founding of the DPRK on September 9, Juche 37 (1948) on the basis of the experience gained in the flames of the anti-Japanese revolution and the firm foundation laid in the building of the country after its liberation.
					
					 Present at the meeting were Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju and other senior officials of the party, army and state, the chairperson of a friendly party, members of the party central leadership organ in Pyongyang, deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly, officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army, officials of organs and industrial establishments in Pyongyang, labor innovators, bereaved family members of revolutionary martyrs, a congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan, overseas Koreans and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Present there on invitation were foreign diplomatic envoys, representatives of international bodies and military attaches of foreign embassies here and foreign guests.
					
					 Pak Pong Ju, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and premier of the DPRK Cabinet, made a report.
					
					 He said that the founding of the DPRK meant the great birth of the Juche-type people's power, the first of its kind in the history of nation-building in the era of independence, and an event of national historical significance as it brought about a dramatic change in carving out the destiny of the country and its people. 
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The nearly seven decades-long history of the DPRK is a glorious one in which it developed into an invincible socialist state under the outstanding  and tested leadership of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 The President and leader Kim Jong Il set forth the idea of building an independent and sovereign state and the line for building a thriving nation reflecting the requirements of the times and the aspiration of the people and built on this land a country independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence, weathering all sorts of trials with steel-like will and distinguished leadership ability, and thus set an example in building the socialist power. 
					
					 They made sure that the DPRK government regarded believing in the people as in Heaven as its basic idea of nation-building and fully applied the slogan "We serve the people!" to the state activities and all the lines, policies and activities were thoroughly implemented to protect the independent rights and interests of the people.
					
					 They made ceaseless long journeys of patriotic devotion to lay a strong economic foundation so that the Korean people may enjoy happiness and wellbeing generation after generation, and brought about great changes in the drive for building an economic power and improving the people's living standard. 
					
					 In the whole period of leading the revolution they, pioneers and leaders of the Songun revolution, turned the DPRK into an invincible military power on the revolutionary principle that arms guarantees the victory of the revolutionary cause and prosperity of the country and nation. 
					
					 They regarded the reunification of the country as the supreme task of the nation and greatest patriotic cause and worked heart and soul to hand down a reunified country to posterity. They steadily raised the prestige and influence of the DPRK in the international arena and developed foreign relations, making undying contributions to accomplishing the cause of global independence. 
					
					 Under the leadership of the party the DPRK is dynamically advancing for the final victory in the drive for building a thriving nation, the reporter noted, calling for building a paradise for the people, the best power in the world, on this land as early as possible and stepping up the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche. 
					
					 It is the consistent stand of the DPRK to bring about a great change in the north-south relations and pave a wide avenue to independent reunification, he said, adding:
					
					 The government of the DPRK will as ever make every effort to preserve peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and in the region and achieve global independence and boost the friendly and cooperative relations with those countries which are friendly towards it. 
					
					 The DPRK's flag, which has fluttered as a symbol of victory and dignity of the motherland, will always flutter in the sky of the century as a signpost of the great Paektusan nation.

articles.title: North-South Red Cross Working Contact Made
articles.content:
North-South Red Cross Working Contact Made
 Panmunjom, September 8 (KCNA) -- There took place a north-south Red Cross working contact at Panmunjom on Monday and Tuesday. 
					 Both sides discussed working issues in arranging the reunion of separated families and relatives on the occasion of the Harvest Moon Day (Chusok) and adopted an agreement. 
					
					 According to it, the north and the south decided to hold the reunion of separated families and relatives at Mt. Kumgang Resort from October 20 to 26 and to hold north-south Red Cross talks at an early date for wide-ranging discussion on the matters of mutual concern.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Politically-motivated Suppression of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan Assailed
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Politically-motivated Suppression of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan Assailed
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- The Japanese authorities hurled more than 30 policemen at early hours on Sept. 6 into the operation for searching the Korean primary, middle and high school in Hokkaido and then the Hokkaido headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and all institutions in the hall of the headquarters and houses of Koreans.
					 A spokesman for the Committee for Aiding Overseas Compatriots of Korea issued a statement Tuesday which said this is an intolerable provocation against the DPRK and Chongryon and a hideous criminal act.
					
					 The statement continued:
					
					 Clear is the aim sought by the Japanese authorities in staging the anti-Chongryon burlesque once again at a time when tension on the Korean Peninsula was deescalated and Koreans are about to celebrate the national day.
					
					 This is aimed to make the public convince that Chongryon is an illegal criminal organization, escalate anti-DPRK and anti-Chongryon moves deliberately and thus tarnish the image of Chongryon and invent a pretext for kicking off a wholesale crackdown on it at a time when the prestige of the DPRK and Chongryon is rising day by day.
					
					 We will never remain an on-looker to the Japanese reactionaries' forcible search and arrest of officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan.
					
					 With no lie and fabrication to intensify the suppression of Chongryon can the Japanese authorities hold in check the righteous and patriotic activities of Chongryon.
					
					 If the Japanese authorities truly want the improvement of the DPRK-Japan relations, they should stop at once the reckless politically-motivated suppression of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan and human rights abuses against them and immediately set free those Koreans unreasonably arrested.
					
					 We will closely follow the attitude of the Japanese authorities.

articles.title: Delegation of Ministry of People's Security Leaves for Russia
articles.content:
Delegation of Ministry of People's Security Leaves for Russia
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Ministry of People's Security led by Councilor Ri Song Chol left here Tuesday to take part in the 2nd World Firefighting and Rescue Forum to be held in Moscow.

articles.title: Japan's Kyodo News Delegation Here
articles.content:
Japan's Kyodo News Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Kyodo News headed by President Masaki Fukuyama arrived here Tuesday.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Indian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Indian President
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Indian President Pranab Mukherjee on August 24.
					 The Indian president in the message extended warm greetings and congratulations to Kim Jong Un and people of the DPRK on behalf of the Indian government and people and on his own behalf on the occasion of the founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 India greatly values the traditional friendly ties between the peoples of the two countries, the message said.
					
					 The message noted that India hoped to join the government of the DPRK in making efforts to boost bilateral cooperation in the interests of the two sides.
					
					 It sincerely wished Kim Jong Un good health and the friendly people of the DPRK progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Ethiopian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Ethiopian President 
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Mulatu Teshome, president of the Federal Democratic Republic of Ethiopia, on August 19. 
					 The Ethiopian president in the message said that he was greatly pleased to extend the warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un and, through him, to the government and people of the DPRK on behalf of the government and people of Ethiopia and on his own behalf on the occasion of the 67th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK. 
					
					 The message sincerely wished Kim Jong Un steady happiness and the people of the DPRK peace and prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Mongolian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Mongolian President
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Mongolian President Tsakhiagiin Elbegdorj on Sept. 3.
					 The message said:
					
					 I extend sincere and warm salute to you and, through you, to the friendly Korean people on the occasion of the 67th birthday of the DPRK.
					
					 I am satisfied over the fact that the traditional relations of cooperation between the two countries are growing stronger in all fabrics of the society.
					
					 It gives me pleasure to cooperate with you in developing in depth these relations in political and economic fields and strengthening peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and in the region and the world in the future.
					
					 I, availing myself of this opportunity, wish respected Your Excellency good health and happiness and the friendly Korean people prosperity and development.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Indonesian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Indonesian President
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Indonesian President Joko Widodo on Sept. 2.
					 The message extended best wishes and warm congratulations to Kim Jong Un on the occasion of September 9, the founding anniversary of the DPRK, on behalf of the government and the people of Indonesia.
					
					 It expressed full belief that the ties of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger in the future in the common interests of the two peoples.
					
					 Sending highest regard to Kim Jong Un, the message most sincerely wished him happiness an the people of the DPRK progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Algerian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Algerian President
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Algerian President Abdelaziz Bouteflika on August 15. 
					 In his message the Algerian president said he was pleased to extend the warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un on behalf of the Algerian government and people and on his own behalf on the occasion of the 67th birthday of the DPRK. 
					
					 He sincerely wished Kim Jong Un good health at all times and the friendly Korean people steady progress and development. 
					
					 He reiterated his will to make efforts together with Kim Jong Un to boost the ties of friendship and solidarity in the common interests of the two countries and achieve progress and prosperity of the friendly peoples of the two countries.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Zimbabwean President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Zimbabwean President
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Zimbabwean President Robert G. Mugabe on Aug. 19.
					 In the message the president extended fraternal congratulations to Kim Jong Un and, through him, to the DPRK government and people on behalf of the Zimbabwean government and people and on his own behalf on the occasion of the 67th national day of the DPRK.
					
					 Joining the Korean people in celebrating the important day in their national history, we are pleased that the two countries have good relations, the message said, and continued:
					
					 We will further strengthen these relations through the expansion of the bilateral cooperation.
					
					 The message wished Kim Jong Un good health and the people of the DPRK lasting peace and prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from President of DR Congo
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from President of DR Congo
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Joseph Kabila Kabange, president of the Democratic Republic of Congo, on August 14. 
					 The president in his message warmly congratulated Kim Jong Un on the national day of the DPRK and wished him good health and happiness. 
					
					 He once again assured Kim Jong Un that he would join the latter in making efforts to boost the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Portuguese President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Portuguese President
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Portuguese President Anibal Cavaco Silva on August 17.
					 The message extended congratulations to Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the founding anniversary of the DPRK, sincerely wishing the people of the DPRK progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Kenyan President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Kenyan Preside
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Kenyan President Uhuru Kenyatta on Sept. 2.
					 The message extended warm congratulations to Kim Jong Un on behalf of the Kenyan government and people and on his own behalf on the occasion of the 67th birthday of the DPRK.
					
					 I am pleased with the friendly relations between the two countries and warmly hope that these good relations will grow stronger in the interests of the peoples of the two countries, the message said.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Thai King
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Thai King
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from King of Thailand Bhumibol Adulyadej on September 4. 
					 In the message the Thai king wished Kim Jong Un good health and happiness and the DPRK and its people welfare and prosperity on the occasion of the founding anniversary of the DPRK, pleased to extend sincere congratulations and the best wishes to him. 
					
					 The Thai king referred with great pleasure to the fact that 2015 is the year marking the 40th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between Thailand and the DPRK. 
					
					 He expressed the belief that the bilateral cooperation would grow stronger in different fields.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Eritrean President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Eritrean President
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Eritrean President Issaias Afewerki on Sept. 2.
					 The president extended the most sincere congratulations to Kim Jong Un and the government and people of the DPRK on behalf of the government and people of Eritrea and on his own behalf on the occasion of the national day of the DPRK.
					
					 The president wished Kim Jong Un good health and the people of the DPRK success in the efforts for peace.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Zambian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Zambian President
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Zambian President Edgar Lungu on August 24.
					 The message extended sincere congratulations and fraternal greetings to Kim Jong Un and the DPRK government on behalf of the government and people of Zambia on the occasion of the 67th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					
					 It said that Zambia is rejoiced over the warm and friendly relations with the DPRK, expressing thanks to the DPRK's contribution to the development of Zambia's healthcare.
					
					 It hoped that these relations would continue to strengthen in the mutual interests of the two countries and peoples.
					
					 Expressing the highest regard to Kim Jong Un, the message sincerely wished him good health and the Korean people peace and prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Myanmar President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Myanmar President
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Myanmar President Thein Sein on September 3. 
					 The Myanmar president in his message extended the warmest congratulations and best wishes to Kim Jong Un and, through him, to the people of the DPRK on behalf of the Myanmar people and on his own behalf on the occasion of the auspicious 67th birthday of the DPRK. 
					
					 Paying highest regard to Kim Jong Un, the president sincerely wished the people of the DPRK steady success, happiness and prosperity.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il from Nigerian President
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il from Nigerian President 
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Muhammadu Buhari, president and commander-in-chief of the Armed Forces of the Federal Republic of Nigeria, sent a floral basket to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on the occasion of the 67th founding anniversary of the DPRK. 
					 The floral basket was placed before the statues on Tuesday.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Head of Nigerian Body
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Head of Nigerian Body
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un Tuesday received a floral basket from Ibrahim Mantu, chairman of the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association, on the occasion of the 67th birthday of the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Basket from Family of Chinese Anti-Japanese Revolutionary Martyr
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Basket from Family of Chinese Anti-Japanese Revolutionary Martyr
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket Tuesday from the family of Zhang Wei-Hua, a Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr, on the occasion of the 67th birthday of the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter from Military Attaches Corps
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter from Military Attaches Corps
Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and congratulatory letter from the military attaches corps here on the occasion of the 67th birthday of the DPRK.
					 They were handed to an official concerned Tuesday by Le Duy Long, military attache of the Vietnamese embassy, on behalf of the military attaches corps.

articles.title: Dancing Party Held by Women
articles.content:
Dancing Party Held by Women
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Officials and members of the women's union held a dancing party at the plaza of the Arch of Triumph on Tuesday to mark the 67th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The dancing party began to the tune of "Song of the Proclamation of the People's Republic." 
					
					 Women presented dances, expressing boundless reverence for President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who built the genuine country of the people, dignified socialist power and demonstrated its might all over the world. 
					
					 They cheerfully danced to the tune of songs "Fly Our Tri-color National Flag of the Republic," "Pyongyang Is Best" and "Hullari." 
					
					 When songs "Women Are Flowers" and "My Wife" were played, the dancing party became more jovial.

articles.title: Oratorical Meeting Held by Workers and Trade Union Members
articles.content:
Oratorical Meeting Held by Workers and Trade Union Members
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- An oratorical meeting was held by workers and trade union members at the Central Hall of Workers Tuesday on the occasion of the 67th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Kim Mun Hui, worker of a unit under the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, in an oratory told a story about the patriotic devotion made by President Kim Il Sung for the founding of the DPRK.
					
					 Ryu Chang Sun, itinerant lecturer of the trade union of the Pyongyang Trackmen's Team, told about how the President achieved the historic cause of national liberation.
					
					 Kim Yong Bok, itinerant lecturer of the trade union of the Pyongyang Tanning Factory, said that the whole life of leader Kim Jong Il was the one of a peerlessly great man who dedicated his all to the prosperity of Kim Il Sung's nation, socialist Korea.
					
					 Kim Hye Gyong, worker of the Pyongyang Elevator Management Bureau, noted that the national power of Songun Korea has grown stronger and the dignity and pride of the nation have been fully demonstrated to the whole world thanks to the long journeys for Songun leadership made by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Nam Chun Bin, chairman of the primary committee of the trade union of Pyongyang Railway Station, told about the revolutionary history of the great leaders who provided ceaseless field guidance for the happiness of the people and the prosperity of the country.
					
					 Kim Un Jong, worker of the Anju Silk Mill, stressed that the service personnel and people of the DPRK would glorify the grand festival in October as a great revolutionary event of prospering Songun Korea.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Members of the missions of the UNDP, the WFP, FAO and WHO here and Jong Il Sim, bereaved family member of DPRK Hero An Tong Su, visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Tuesday on the occasion of the 67th birthday of the DPRK.
					 They laid floral baskets before the statues and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- A congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the 67th birthday of the DPRK led by Hong In Hum, chairman of the Central Audit Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They laid bunches of flowers before the graves of Kim Po Hyon and Ri Po Ik, grandparents of the President, and Kim Hyong Jik and Kang Pan Sok, his parents, and paid silent tribute to them.
					
					 They looked round historic relics at the old home in Mangyongdae. 
					
					 The head of the delegation said: Whenever I visit the old home of the President, I feel strong reverence for him. The immortal feats of the President who dedicated his whole life to the prosperity of the country and happiness of the people will shine forever.
					
					 The congratulatory group also toured the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum.

articles.title: Electronic Commerce System "Sangyon" Introduced in DPRK
articles.content:
Electronic Commerce System "Sangyon" Introduced in DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- The Institute of the Commercial Science in the DPRK developed "Sangyon", an electronic commerce system.
					 The system makes it possible to ensure business through local network with credit card issued by the Central Bank.
					
					 This 24-hour service system has already been introduced to the West Pyongyang Department Store and many other commercial units, winning popularity among its users.

articles.title: Korean People Demand End to U.S. Military Presence
articles.content:
Korean People Demand End to U.S. Military Presence
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Seventy years has passed since the U.S. imperialists occupied the southern part of Korea.
					 In the period the U.S. aggression troops have committed all sorts of crimes in south Korea, turning it into their colony.
					
					 When a popular uprising took place in Jeju Island in April 1948, they killed in a cruel way more than 70 000 islanders, equivalent to one fourth of its population.
					
					 In the period before the Korean War alone, the GIs massacred at least one million innocent people in south Korea.
					
					 After the war (1950-1953), the U.S. troops present in south Korea have killed a large number of inhabitants, debasing them as "field mouse".
					
					 Among those killed are Yun Kum I, Jon Tong Rok, Sin Hyo Sun and Sim Mi Son. The murderous crimes by GIs are beyond human imagination in terms of scale, cruelty and durability.
					
					 Such heinous crimes as man-killing by the GIs still continue in south Korea without letup, due to the humiliating S. Korea-U.S. "Status of Forces Agreement" (SOFA) which provides the occupation troops with privileges and extraterritoriality.
					
					 The south Korean people should get the unequal "SOFA" abrogated and punish the pro-American traitors and drive out the U.S. imperialist aggression troops violating the nation's dignity from south Korea.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Lays Bare U.S. Scenario for Invading DPRK
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Lays Bare U.S. Scenario for Invading DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- The U.S. staged Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises pursuant to new OPLAN 5015 aimed at preemptive attack on the DPRK and decided to deploy three stealth strategic bombers B-2 on Guam.
					 This is sparking off the surging resentment and enmity of the service personnel and people of the DPRK as the U.S. openly revealed its vicious attempt to invade the DPRK anytime.
					
					 The U.S. is staging nuclear war maneuvers and trying to deploy strategic weapons while describing the drills as "annual" and "defensive ones" but can never conceal its black-hearted intention to stifle the DPRK by force of arms.
					
					 This is clearly evidenced by the contents of OPLAN 5015 which was applied to Ulji Freedom Guardian.
					
					 OPLAN 5015 is an unpardonable scenario for a nuclear war which makes indiscriminate preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK an established fact as it is a combination of OPLAN 5029 worked out under the pretext of coping with "contingency" in the north and OPLAN 5027, a scenario for an all-out war.
					
					 The keynote of OPLAN 5015 is to strike relevant facilities and weapons by use of stealth strategic bombers and other strategic weapons and, at the same time, attain even the purpose of "removing headquarters" the moment a "sign of the north's use of WMDs" is detected.
					
					 Strategic bombers to be deployed on Guam will have the mission to carry out this criminal operation.
					
					 The human history of wars records many war scenarios but there is no such extreme provocative and illegal scenario as OPLAN 5015 aimed at disabling the other party through preemptive nuclear strike before the start of war and carrying out the plan for "removing headquarters".
					
					 The U.S. moves for invading the DPRK are unprecedented in history for their reckless and dangerous nature.
					
					 The U.S. is much upset by the DPRK dynamically advancing under the banner of independence against imperialism and the banner of socialism in the important vantage of the Asia-Pacific region which the U.S. regards as its strategic center in the 21st century. That is why the U.S. is making desperate efforts to bring down the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. seeks to steadily escalate tension on the Korean Peninsula through ceaseless joint military exercises and thus make the DPRK exhausted and slacken its alertness.
					
					 A "sign of north's use of WMDs" mentioned in the U.S. plan for invading the DPRK is no more than a smokescreen for concealing its true colors as a criminal and it is, in essence, aimed at watching for a "moment the north remains ideologically and morally weak."
					
					 It is the U.S. invariable scenario for bringing down the DPRK at a single strike with all military potentials involved the moment it gets slack.
					
					 The U.S. kicked off the madcap Ulji Freedom Guardian and deliberately opened to public its decision to deploy strategic nuclear strike means at a time when the situation on the Korean peninsula was put on the track of detente this time, bringing to light once again its sinister intention.
					
					 The U.S. is, indeed, a maniac keen on invading the DPRK and the arch criminal steadily escalating tension on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: U.S. Should Make Political Decision to Withdraw Its Forces from S. Korea: Commentator of Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Should Make Political Decision to Withdraw Its Forces from S. Korea: Commentator of Rodong Sinmun 
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday carries a commentator's article on the lapse of 70 years since the U.S. imperialist  aggressor forces occupied south Korea on September 8, 1945 under the mask of "liberator".
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The U.S. occupation of south Korea can never be justified from the viewpoints of history, international law and the present trend of the times. 
					
					 There is no justification for the U.S. forces to stay in south Korea.
					
					 The U.S. forces did not bring south Korea liberation but put it under colonial yoke.
					
					 The "deterrent for checking southward invasion" touted by the U.S. forces in south Korea sounds nonsensical.  
					
					 The U.S. insistence on the unjustifiable policy of occupying south Korea only discloses its dirty ambition for aggression and scenario for dominating the world.
					
					 The U.S. forces in south Korea are not liberators and guardians of peace but occupiers and aggressors and military executors of the U.S. imperialists' policy to dominate south Korea and their hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. selected and occupied south Korea in the vast Asian region. This was not simply aimed to put a half of Korea under the U.S. control but to swallow up the whole of Korea and stretch its tentacles of aggression to the continent with it as a springboard and dominate the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 The U.S. should make a political decision to withdraw its forces from south Korea. There can be no other option for the U.S.

articles.title: Ostracizing Politicians Keen on False Propaganda Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Ostracizing Politicians Keen on False Propaganda Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- An editorial titled "Shameless propaganda of Representative Kim Mu Song" was posted on the south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People on Sept. 3.
					 The editorial said that Kim, representative of the "Saenuri Party", in his speech at the "National Assembly" said the youth and the part-time jobbers are outside the trade unions, adding their misfortune is attributable to the trade unions.
					
					 It noted that the trade unions have not been expanded entirely because of the "government's" and the conservative political camp's persistent obstruction of the trade union activities and their pro-conglomerate policy.
					
					 Their assertions are little short of criticizing the trade unions, shutting their eyes to the consequences entailed by their wrong acts, the editorial added.
					
					 It called for ostracizing politicians keen on false propaganda to consolidate their own political bases.

articles.title: Reception Given by Chongryon on DPRK's Birthday
articles.content:
Reception Given by Chongryon on DPRK's Birthday
 Tokyo, September 7 (KNS-KCNA) -- A reception was given at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on Sept. 7 in celebration of the 67th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Present there were Ho Jong Man, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), its vice-chairmen and department directors, chairpersons of Chongryon headquarters in Kanto area, leading officials of organizations and enterprises of Chongryon and Korean businessmen in Japan.
					
					 Present there on invitation were personages of political, economic, media, social and cultural circles of Japan, ambassadors and staff members of foreign embassies and representatives of international bodies in Tokyo and foreign correspondents.
					
					 Ho Jong Man said in a speech that the Korean people have made leaping progress every day in building a socialist economic power and highly civilized nation by thoroughly carrying out the tasks set forth by Marshal Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address and turned out as one in the drive to greet the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea as a grand political festival.
					
					 He held that for peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and the improved inter-Korean relations the U.S. should roll back its hostile policy towards the DPRK and stop actions to ignite a war.
					
					 Japan has made no reparation still today 70 years since its defeat and even discriminated and suppressed Koreans in Japan and their descendants, the biggest victims of its colonial rule over Korea, he stressed.
					
					 He urged the Japanese authorities to draw a lesson from the past and set right the present wrongdoings and come out in real earnest to redeem the inglorious past and improve the relations with the DPRK in the spirit of the DPRK-Japan Pyongyang Declaration.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Vicious Suppression of Chongryon under Fire
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Vicious Suppression of Chongryon under Fire
 Tokyo, September 7 (KNS-KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries kicked off another conspiratorial suppressive racket as part of their persistent moves to detect the activities of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and internal affairs of its organization.
					 The Hokkaido police authorities forcibly searched the Hokkaido headquarters of Chongryon and all other institutions under Chongryon in its hall and also Hokkaido Korean primary, middle and high school under the pretext of "fraud case" of Koreans in Japan on September 6.
					
					 They arrested a former person concerned of the Hokkaido Commercial Association of Chongryon, saying he helped write a paper of application for employment subsidies, and searched the office of the Association in the hall of Chongryon headquarters.
					
					 The police also attempted to search the house of the chairman of the Hokkaido headquarters of Chongryon.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries committed such smear campaign several times this year.
					
					 This is a politically-motivated provocation against the DPRK and a hideous crackdown aimed at stamping out Chongryon.

articles.title: Foreign Media Observe Birthday of DPRK
articles.content:
Foreign Media Observe Birthday of DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Foreign media carried special write-ups and aired special program on the occasion of the 67th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					 The Malaysian paper Guang Ming Daily on September 4 carried an article titled "Choice of the DPRK" accompanied with photos documenting the achievements made under Marshal Kim Jong Un's Songun leadership.
					
					 The paper said that independence, Songun and socialism are what characterize the careers of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and that independence is the life and soul of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea.
					
					 The Myanmar paper The New Age on September 3 dedicated two whole pages to an article titled "Kim Jong Un's mode of creation" accompanied with the photos documenting his exploits and photos introducing the true picture of Songun Korea.
					
					 The paper said that his thinking and practice are not confined to some sectors, units and some people but all sectors and people of the country are taken deep care of by him.
					
					 On the same day the Senegal State Radio reported that the Korean people led by him are performing world-startling miracles and innovations in the building of a thriving socialist nation every day and they are convinced of the final victory.

articles.title: Swiss Bodies Denounce U.S. Forces' Presence in S. Korea
articles.content:
Swiss Bodies Denounce U.S. Forces' Presence in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on Sept. 2.
					 This significant year marking the 70th anniversaries of Korea's liberation and the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea also observes 70 years since the beginning of the U.S. forces' presence in south Korea and the tragedy of split of the Korean nation, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. occupied the southern part of the Korean Peninsula militarily on Sept. 8, 1945.
					
					 The U.S. troops who landed on south Korea under the mask of "liberator" was, in actuality, barbarous conquerors of colony and occupiers replacing the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 The people in the northern half of Korea have enjoyed freedom and happiness for the past seven decades but the south Koreans have had their sovereignty violated under the domination of foreign forces since more than a century ago.
					
					 The U.S. forces' presence in south Korea has lasted till today and, consequently, the split of the Korean nation has persisted.
					
					 The U.S. turned south Korea into its military base to invade the independent northern half of Korea.
					
					 It still remains unchanged in its purpose to put the whole of Korea under its control.
					
					 The U.S. forces' illegal, neo-colonial presence in south Korea and the pain resulting from the national split should no longer be allowed to go on.

articles.title: DPRK's Birthday Marked in Various Countries
articles.content:
DPRK's Birthday Marked in Various Countries
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- There took place events in different countries on the occasion of the 67th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					 They included round-table talks and photo and book exhibitions in Germany and Guinea, an opening ceremony of the week of a photo exhibition in Nigeria and the DPRK cultural exhibition in China.
					
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos documenting the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed were their works and photos, books and art pieces showing the history of the DPRK.
					
					 The chairman of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany said that the President was the founding father of socialist Korea who defeated the burglarious Japanese imperialists and built the DPRK, the first genuine state for the people, in Korea.
					
					 A vice-director of the Art and Cultural Council of the Ministry of Federal Capital Territory of Nigeria said in his speech:
					
					 The President founded the DPRK, defended the sovereignty and dignity of the country with honor and wisely led socialist construction,
					
					 Kim Jong Il led the DPRK to demonstrate the might of the independent power despite the worst difficulty and trial and ushered in a new era of building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 Kim Jong Un put the might of socialist Korea on the highest level.

articles.title: DPRK Introduced by Nigerian Body
articles.content:
DPRK Introduced by Nigerian Bod
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted articles on its website on September 1 and 2.
					 The article titled "Paradise for children" said that the baby home and orphanage located on the bank of the Taedong River have every excellent amenity and environment for children's upbringing, education and living.
					
					 The article noted:
					
					 It was supreme leader Kim Jong Un whom all children in the DPRK call their father that initiated the building of palace-like Pyongyang Baby Home and Orphanage and ensured their successful completion.
					
					 He chose the sites for Pyongyang Baby Home and Orphanage in the best place on the bank of the Taedong River, guided their layout several times and sent a powerful construction force to undertake the projects.
					
					 As soon as he finished his New Year Address, he visited Pyongyang Baby Home and Orphanage and had a photo taken with the children there.
					
					 Rosy is the future of the DPRK where his noble love for the youngster generation and future brings shining realities.
					
					 The article titled "Soldiers' father" praised the exploits he performed by leading the Songun revolution.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un se reune con delegacion estatal de Cuba
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un se reune con delegacion estatal de Cuba
Pyongyang, 8 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, se reunio el dia 7 con la delegacion estatal de la Republica de Cuba encabezada por Miguel Mario Diaz Canel Bermudez, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Cuba y primer vicepresidente de los Consejos de Estado y de Ministros, de visita en Corea.
					El Mariscal dio calida bienvenida a la delegacion estatal de Cuba que visito la RPDC con motivo del 55o aniversario del  establecimiento de las relaciones diplomaticas entre los dos paises y le encomendo transmitir su saludo a los estimados camaradas Fidel Castro Ruz y Raul Castro Ruz.
					
					Dijo que Fidel y Raul, amigos intimos y companeros de armas del pueblo coreano, enviaron a la RPDC la delegacion estatal de la Republica de Cuba antes de un mes del aniversario 70 de la fundacion del PTC, lo cual sirve de gran animo al ejercito y pueblo coreanos que libran una dinamica campana para la construccion de un Estado potente socialista.
					
					Recalco que la visita a Corea de la delegacion estatal de Cuba reviste un significado importante en infundir a las generaciones venideras la historia y tradicion de amistad entre ambos paises y fortalecer mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion fraternales entre los dos paises y expuso la conviccion de que la vitalidad invencible de amistad Corea-Cuba se pondran de pleno manifiesto en el futuro por los esfuerzos comunes de ambas partes.
					
					En la audiencia, el companero Miguel transmitio al Mariscal un saludo cordial enviado por los camaradas Fidel Castro Ruz y Raul Castro Ruz.
					
					Miguel dio agradecimiento por lo que el Mariscal se haya reunido con la delegacion aunque estaba muy ocupado por dirigir en la delantera la lucha por la construccion de un Estado prospero.
					
					Apunto que las relaciones de amistad entre los dos paises, preparadas por los camaradas Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il junto con los camaradas Fidel Castro Ruz y Raul Castro Ruz, se consolidan y se desarrollan en medio de la peculiar atencion del estimado camarada Kim Jong Un y el camarada Raul Castro Ruz.
					
					Asevero que el partido y gobierno cubanos estan complacidos de que el pueblo coreano logra enormes exitos en la lucha por la edificacion de un potente Estado socialista bajo la guia del Mariscal.
					
					Senalo que Cuba y Corea estan unidas fuertemente con la ideologia comun y el sentimiento de amistad aunque se hallan muy distanciadas geograficamente y puntualizo que los pueblos de los dos paises son los camaradas de armas que se encuentran juntos en la primera linea de independencia antiimperialista. Agrego que consolidar y desarrollar sin cesar las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre Cuba y Corea es una orientacion inconmovible del partido y el gobierno de Cuba.
					
					Las conversaciones se realizaron en un ambiente lleno de amistad.
					
					Miguel Mario Diaz Canel Bermudez entrego al Mariscal regalo preparado con toda sinceridad.
					
					El Mariscal le expreso agradecimiento y se fotografio junto con los miembros de la delegacion estatal de Cuba.
					
					En la ocasion tomo parte Kim Yang Gon, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC y secretario del CC del partido.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia funcion artistica junto con delegacion estatal de Cuba
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia funcion artistica junto con delegacion estatal de Cuba
Pyongyang, 8 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio el dia 7 la funcion de la banda Moranbong y el Coro Estatal Benemerito, ofrecida para dar bienvenida a la delegacion estatal de la Republica de Cuba de visita en Corea con motivo del aniversario 55 del establecimiento de relaciones diplomaticas entre ambos paises.
					Fueron invitados Miguel Mario Diaz Canel Bermudez, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Cuba y primer vicepresidente de los Consejos de Estado y de Ministros y su esposa, los miembros de la delegacion, el embajador German Hermin Ferras Alvarez y otros miembros de la sede diplomatica cubana en Corea.
					
					La vieron Hwang Pyong So, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Yang Gon, Ri Su Yong, Kim Kye Gwan, los funcionarios del Comite Central del PTC, el Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares y el Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores, asi como los miembros del Conjunto Artistico Wangjaesan y otros conjuntos artisticos militares y civiles.
					
					El Mariscal, junto con Ri Sol Ju, aparecio en el asiento y respondio a las efusivas aclamaciones de los ejecutantes y espectadores.
					
					Artistas coreanas ofrecieron ramos de flores al Mariscal y a Miguel Mario Diaz Canel Bermudez.
					
					En la escena de funcion iniciada con los himnos nacionales de los dos paises, se pusieron la musica orquestal del Coro Estatal Benemerito "Pyongyang es la mejor", la musica orquestal y coro masculino "Cancion del Ejercito Popular de Corea", la musica orquestal "Serie de musicas famosas mundiales", el quinteto masculino "No renunciemos el credo en la revolucion aunque muramos", el coro masculino "Iremos al monte Paektu", la musica ligera de la banda Moranbong "De un tiron" y otras piezas variadas.
					
					Los ejecutantes elogiaron las proezas indelebles realizadas por los grandes lideres coreanos, quienes prepararon y glorificaron la gran historia y excelentes tradiciones de firme obligacion camaraderil y amistad entre los ejercitos y pueblos de Corea y Cuba, y describieron el temperamento heroico de Corea de Juche que registra milagros e innovaciones en la construccion de un Estado prospero bajo la direccion del Mariscal.
					
					Las actrices de la banda Moranbong dieron alegria a los espectadores al describir con excelencia la musica instrumental y cancion "Guantanamera" y el coro femenino "Isla Capri", que reflejan el noble sentimiento ideologico del pueblo cubano.
					
					Cuando aparecieron en el trasfondo de la escena las imagenes historicas alusivas a los camaradas Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il reuniendose con los camaradas Fidel Castro Ruz y Raul Castro Ruz, el teatro estaba lleno de gran emocion.
					
					La funcion arranco una efusiva ovacion de los espectadores por haber mostrado la ferrea conviccion de que no se cambiaran generacion tras generacion el sentimiento de amistad arraigado en lo profundo del corazon de los ejercitos y pueblos de ambos paises en la lucha por la independencia antiimperialista y el socialismo.
					
					Terminada la funcion, volvieron a estremecer el teatro las aclamaciones de "!Viva!"
					
					El Mariscal respondio con su mano alzada a las entusiastas aclamaciones de los ejecutantes y espectadores.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion al presidente sirio
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion al presidente sirio 
Pyongyang, 8 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio este martes un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica Arabe de Siria, Bashar al-Assad. 
					El texto senala:
					
					Le extiendo a Vd. mis calurosas felicitaciones por su 50o cumpleanos.
					
					Bajo la correcta orientacion de Vd., el gobierno y pueblo de Siria alcanzan grandes exitos en la lucha por defender la seguridad y la integridad territorial del pais superando con audacia todas las pruebas y dificultades. 
					
					Estoy convencido de que el pueblo sirio logre sin falta la victoria final en la justa lucha por defender la soberania del pais y la dignidad de la nacion frente a las incesantes maniobras de agresion y el terrorismo de las fuerzas hostiles. 
					
					El gobierno y pueblo de la RPDC estaran siempre junto con el gobierno y pueblo de la Republica Arabe de Siria en la lucha conjunta por la independencia antiimperialista y expresaran el invariable apoyo y solidaridad con la justa lucha de ustedes. 
					
					Con la seguridad de que las relaciones de amistad camaraderil y solidaridad combativa entre Corea y Siria, preparadas por los grandes lideres antecesores, se fortaleceran mas por nuestros esfuerzos conjuntos, le deseo a Vd. de todo corazon buena salud y mayores exitos en sus responsabilidades.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensajes de respuesta a jefes de Estado de varios paises
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensajes de respuesta a jefes de Estado de varios paises
Pyongyang, 8 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio los mensajes de respuesta a los jefes de Estado de varios paises quienes le enviaron los mensajes de felicitacion con motivo del 70o aniversario de la liberacion de Corea.
					Entre ellos figuran el presidente de la Republica Arabe de Siria, Bashar al-Assad, el presidente de la Republica Islamica de Pakistan, Mamnoon Hussain, el presidente del Estado de Palestina y del Comite Ejecutivo de la Organizacion de Liberacion Palestina, Mahmoud Abbas, el presidente de la Republica de Guinea Ecuatorial, Obiang Nguema Mbasogo y el presidente de la Republica de Angola, Jose Eduardo Dos Santos.
					
					En las misivas, el Mariscal expreso el agradecimiento de que los jefes de Estado enviaron la felicitacion y saludos sinceros con motivo del 70o aniversario de la liberacion de la patria.
					
					Convencido de que se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran en el futuro tambien las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y los respectivos paises, el remitente formulo votos por exitos de los destinatarios.

articles.title: Acto central por el 67o aniversario de fundacion de RPDC
articles.content:
Acto central por el 67o aniversario de fundacion de RPDC
Pyongyang, 8 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este martes en esta capital el acto central por el 67o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					A base de las experiencias adquiridas en el fragor de la lucha antijaponesa y del firme fundamento de construccion del pais asentado despues de la liberacion del pais, el Presidente Kim Il Sung proclamo a todo el mundo el 9 de septiembre del 37 (1948) de la Era Juche la fundacion de la RPDC. 
					
					Asistieron al acto Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el ejercito y el Estado, el presidente de partido amigo, los miembros del organo de direccion del Comite Central del Partido en la ciudad de Pyongyang, los diputados a la Asamblea Popular Suprema, los funcionarios de organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, entidades sociales, ministerios y organismos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, los funcionarios de instituciones, fabricas y empresas en esta capital, los innovadores laborales, los familiares de martires revolucionarios, los miembros del grupo de felicitacion de coreanos residentes en Japon, los compatriotas residentes en ultramar y el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang.
					
					Fueron invitados los representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales y los agregados militares, acreditados en Corea, y otros huespedes extranjeros.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC. 
					
					El informante dijo que la fundacion de la RPDC fue el gran  nacimiento del poder popular de tipo jucheano en la historia de construccion de Estado de la era de la independencia y un acontecimiento nacional que trajo el cambio radical en la forja del destino de la patria y el pueblo. 
					
					La trayectoria de la RPDC de cerca de 70 anos es la gloriosa en que bajo la destacada y probada orientacion de los grandes hombres sin iguales del monte Paektu, se ha desarrollado incesantemente como Estado socialista invicto, afirmo Pak y continuo:
					
					El Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il presentaron la idea de construccion de Estado independiente y soberano y la linea de edificacion de Estado prospero, en reflejo de la demanda de la epoca y la aspiracion del pueblo, y levantaron sobre esta tierra patria el pais caracterizado por la independencia, la autarquia y la autodefensa superando todas las pruebas con la voluntad de acero y la extraordinaria capacidad directiva, de modo que crearon el modelo de la construccion de la potencia socialista. 
					
					Condujeron para que el poder de la RPDC materializara en las actividades estatales la consigna "!Servir al pueblo!" tomando Iminwichon (considerar al pueblo como el cielo) como ideario fundamental de la construccion de Estado y se dirigieran todas las lineas, politicas y actividades del poder a asegurar los derechos independientes y los intereses de las masas populares. 
					
					Para sentar la firme base economica que asegure la eterna felicidad del pueblo, estuvieron siempre en el camino de abnegacion patriotica a fin de registrar un gran viraje en la construccion de la potencia economica y la mejora de las condiciones de vida del pueblo.
					
					Los grandes lideres antecesores, explotadores y orientadores de la revolucion del Songun, convirtieron la RPDC en la potencia militar sin rival ateniendose al principio revolucionario de que las fuerzas armadas garantizan la victoria de la causa revolucionaria y la prosperidad del pais y nacion. 
					
					Considerando la reunificacion de la patria como suprema tarea nacional y maxima causa patriotica, hicieron ingentes esfuerzos mentales y fisicos por legar la patria reunificada a las generaciones venideras. Al elevar constantemente el prestigio y la influencia de la RPDC en la palestra internacional y ampliar las relaciones exteriores del pais, hicieron aporte inmortal al cumplimiento de la causa de verificacion de la independencia en el mundo entero. 
					
					Hoy dia, la RPDC marcha con vigor hacia la victoria final de la construccion de un Estado prospero bajo la guia del Partido del Trabajo de Corea. 
					
					Debemos levantar cuanto antes el paraiso del pueblo y la mejor potencia prospera sobre el territorio patrio y adelantar la victoria final de la causa revolucionaria del Juche. 
					
					La RPDC mantiene la invariable posicion de abrir el ancho camino por la reunificacion independiente logrando gran cambio en las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas.
					
					En el futuro tambien el gobierno de la RPDC hara todo lo posible por la paz y estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto de la region y la verificacion de la independencia del mundo y ampliara y desarrollara las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con los paises que nos tratan con amabilidad. 
					
					La bandera nacional de la RPDC, simbolo de la victoria y dignidad de la patria, flameara en el futuro tambien como poste de senal de victoria de la potencia del monte Paektu.

articles.title: Tiene lugar contacto de trabajo de cruz roja Norte-Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Tiene lugar contacto de trabajo de cruz roja Norte-Sur de Corea
Phanmunjom, 8 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar los dias 7 y 8 en Phanmunjom el contacto de trabajo de la cruz roja Norte-Sur.
					En la ocasion, ambas partes consultaron los problemas practicos que se presentan en realizar el encuentro de familiares y parientes separados con motivo de Chusok (15 de agosto de calendario lunar) y aprobaron un acuerdo. 
					
					Segun el documento, ambas partes efectuaran del dia 20 al 26 de octubre el encuentro de familiares y parientes separados en el monte Kumgang y sostendran en un futuro cercano las conversaciones de la cruz roja Norte-Sur para discutir ampliamente los asuntos de interes mutuo.

articles.title: CCACU denuncia represion anti-Chongryon de reaccionarios japoneses
articles.content:
CCACU denuncia represion anti-Chongryon de reaccionarios japoneses
Pyongyang, 8 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El pasado dia 6, las autoridades japonesas lanzaron desde la madrugada a mas de 30 policias a cometer el registro brutal la escuela secundaria basica y superior coreana en Hokkaido, la sede de la Chongryon (Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon) en esta provincia y todos los organos en la casa cultural de la sede y las casas de los compatriotas. 
					El portavoz del Comite Coreano de Ayuda a los Compatriotas en Ultramar, en la declaracion fechada 8, califica esta violencia fascista de intolerable provocacion y crimen anti-RPDC y anti-Chongryon, y continua:
					
					Es obvio el objetivo de esta farsa anti-Chongryon en estos momentos en que se alivia la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y en visperas del dia de la fundacion de la RPDC. 
					
					La verdadera intencion de los reaccionarios japoneses es crear y aumentar escalonadamente el ambiente anti-RPDC y anti-Chongryon como si la Chongryon fuera una entidad criminal e ilicita a fin de manchar el prestigio de la esta legitima entidad y buscar el pretexto de represion anti-Chongryon. 
					
					No estaremos con brazos cruzados ante el registro forzoso y arresto a los funcionarios de la Chongryon y los compatriotas residentes en Japon. 
					
					Por mas que las autoridades japonesas recurran a la represion anti-Chongryon con fraudes e intrigas, no pueden detener nunca las actividades patrioticas de la Chongryon. 
					
					Si las autoridades japonesas desean de veras la mejora de las relaciones RPDC-Japon, deben parar de inmediato la represion politica anti-Chongryon y la violacion de DDHH de los compatriotas residentes en Japon y poner en libertad a los compatriotas coreanos encarcelados injustamente. 
					
					Observaremos la actitud de las autoridades japonesas.
